{"id":989272071,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1688818821,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/989272071/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"44.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        // calculate prefix and suffix sums\n        int n = nums.length;\n        int pre[] = new int[n];\n        int suf[] = new int[n];\n\n        int sum_pre = 0;\n        int sum_suf = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            sum_pre += nums[i];\n            pre[i] = sum_pre;\n            \n            // suffix sum\n            sum_suf += nums[n - i - 1];\n            suf[n - i - 1] = sum_suf;\n        }\n\n        // searching for pivot index\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if(pre[i] - suf[i] == 0) return i;\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
